snippet: The raid comes as federal prosecutors across California have been working for months to shut down medical marijuana dispensaries.
abstract: Federal agents raid Oaksterdam University in Oakland, Calif, a medical marijuana training school that is at the heart of California’s marijuana legalization movement; raid comes as federal prosecutors across California have been working for months to shut down medical marijuana dispensaries.
lead_paragraph: The raid comes as federal prosecutors across California have been working for months to shut down medical marijuana dispensaries.

headline.seo: Medical Marijuana Training School in Oakland Is Raided
headline.main: Federal Officials Raid Medical Marijuana School in Oakland
headline.print_headline: Federal Officials Raid California School Providing Medical Marijuana Training
